about_the_game:
AN INTROVERT'S EXPERIENCE IN AN EXTROVERTS' WORLD

Misgiven is an emotional 2D sci-fi adventure game about the lump in your throat and how difficult it can be to open up to others.

As Cassandra, a space adventurer stranded in a city of masks and unbreathable fog, you come across the mask of an explorer, whose role you'll have to play to stay alive and deliver a warning no one wants to hear. But how well can you pretend to be someone else, and how far will you go?

EXPERIENCE THE WORLD THROUGH THE MASK OF A STRANGER

  • Wear Kasturi's mask and pretend you're her to survive.

  • Investigate her past, discover her social circle and find out what happened to her.

  • Take on her role in order to save the city, or let the mask slip.

WRESTLE WITH YOUR WORDS AND MAKE MEANINGFUL CHOICES

As a lonely space explorer in an identity crisis, your social anxiety makes it difficult to open up to others.

  • Dialogue options - your thoughts - have different emotional weights.

  • Your openness to another person can change over time, and new topics can become available.

  • Play it safe and stick to small-talk, or try to squeeze in difficult topics for a chance to connect deeply, and risk being misunderstood.

EXPLORE A CITY SHROUDED IN MYSTERY

You are stranded in the city of Koriol - built on the rim of a giant crater, veiled in toxic fog.

  • Get lost in hazy, neon-lit streets.

  • Exchange your mask's air filter to survive in the fog.

  • Visit rundown night clubs and floating temples.

  • Try to make this place your home.

EXPRESS YOURSELF WITH HOLOGRAPHIC EMOTES

  • Acquire an entire holographic emote inventory.

  • Convey a certain tone and change the course of the conversation.

  • Show off your connections and get access to people and places.

  • And flip off anyone who's earned it.

name: Misgiven Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11 (64-bit only)
  • Processor: Any AMD or Intel, not older than 8 years (x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 capable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Misgiven is an emotional sci-fi adventure about the lump in your throat. Stranded in a city veiled in toxic fog, take on a stranger's mask to survive. Find allies as a harbinger of doom. Wrestle with your thoughts via a tangible dialogue system. Struggle to keep up the façade - or dare to drop it.
